Crit Effect

Type

Knockback

The target is pushed 1d4x5 feet away.

Bludgeoning

Deep Hurting

The target is fatigued.

Piercing

Gut Slash

The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage and any creature it Swallows Whole is immediately released.

Slashing

Intense Splash

The target takes normal damage, and all creatures adjacent to the target take half damage of the same type.
